A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Given the thousands of directions they could have taken this franchise\, I never thought they would take it to a place worse than Attack of the Clones. 
No identifiable plot
No identifiable direction
No explanation of backstory of protagonist or antagonist
Poorly executed attempts of cheesy humor
Too much similarity to Empire\, with the bad writing and poor direction of a bad direct to DVD sci-fi movie. 
Fire everyone
Start over
Hire Lucas to take the next one back to a high level. 
Don't ruin things for lifelong Star Wars  fans to make Mickey Mouse stockholders dividends. 
0.5 stars because of the year I waited to see the next chapter. 
If I could rate 0\, I would.
